Exchanges List (ID Map)
GET
https://pro-api.coingecko.com/api/v3/exchanges/list

This endpoint allows you to query all the exchanges with ID and name

üëç

Tips

You may use this endpoint to query the list of exchanges including derivatives exchanges for other endpoints that contain params like id(exchange ID).
üìò

Notes

There is no pagination required for this endpoint.
Cache / Update Frequency: every 5 minutes for all the API plans.
QUERY PARAMS
status
string

filter by status of exchanges, default: active

active
inactive
RESPONSE
200

List all exchanges with ID and name

RESPONSE BODY
object
id
string

exchange ID

name
string

exchange name

Updated about 1 month ago

Exchanges List with data
Exchange Data by ID
Did this page help you?
Yes
No
LANGUAGE
Shell
Node
Ruby
PHP
Python
CREDENTIALS
Header
Log in to use your API keys
CURL REQUEST
1
curl --request GET \
2
     --url https://pro-api.coingecko.com/api/v3/exchanges/list \
3
     --header 'accept: application/json'
Try It!
RESPONSE
200
EXAMPLE
1
[
2
  {
3
    "id": "10kswap-starknet-alpha",
4
    "name": "10KSwap"
5
  },
6
  {
7
    "id": "1bch",
8
    "name": "1BCH"
9
  },
10

11
    "id": "3xcalibur",
12
    "name": "3xcalibur"
13

14
